column4: Anyone know how to get removable device icons to always appear in the same place? Their placement seems erratic.
I've been having problem with that in feity
I had this problem in edgy too.

well for me , if it is the same "volume" ie the same cd or the same mp3 player or thumb drive they appear in the same place,  but taking out one cd and putting in another will change the cd icon location ,   you can try unchecking the automatic icon sorting in the rightclick menu from the desktop
